Docs.summary: The base class for all dylan.NET language statements.
Docs.remarks: For a statment to be considered an 'Stmt' it must inherit this class.
This constructor must be rewritten for inheritors of 'Stmt' that specify further fields that are not existant in this base class.

Docs.param: The 'Token' object to add to the array of tokens held inside 'Tokens'.
Docs.summary: Adds a 'Token' object to the list of tokens the statment is made out of.
Docs.remarks: This method is intended as infrastructure for easily adding new tokens to the list. If porting a statment to another object inheriting 'Stmt' just copy the array 'Tokens'. This method will not require re-definition in such cases.

Docs.summary: The line the statments was found in the source fiel according to the lexer.
Docs.remarks: This is required to make debug file info as well as to produce useful verbose messages to the user.

Docs.summary: The list/collection of 'Token' objects held by the statement. Its contents are what make a statment a particular statment type.
Docs.remarks: This array must be copied over to the 'Tokens' field of the target 'Stmt' inheritor during porting of 'Stmt' objects.
